title: Immigration and Emigration Officers’ Association suspends VIP and Silk Route access at BIA
body_lines: The Sri Lanka Immigration and Emigration Officers’ Association (SLIEOA) today announced that it has decided to suspend all VIP and Silk Route access at the Bandaranaike International Airport (BIA), in solidarity of massive hartal tomorrow.

“We decided this morning that all our members will suspend all VIP (except for foreign diplomats) and Silk Route access at BIA, till Sri Lankans see the politicians take responsibility and submit a national framework to overcome the multiple crises, which they created over the past seven decades,” SLIEOA told the Daily FT.
